response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide unparalleled value and excellence. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to our commitment to quality and innovation. Considering its exceptional features and benefits, I believe we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us. I kindly propose a price of $15,000 for this product.
